lyrics:
14 contributorstranslationsportuguêscelebration lyricsverse 1
i think you wanna come over
yeah i heard it through the grapevine
are you drunk are you sober
think about it doesnt matter
and if it makes you feel good then i say do it
i dont know what youre waiting for

prechorus
feel my temperature rising
theres too much heat im gonna lose control
do you want to go higher get closer to the fire
i dont know what you’re waiting for

chorus
come join the party yeah
cause anybody just wont do
lets get this started yeah
cause everybody wants to party with you

verse 2
boy you got a reputation
but youre gonna have to prove it

am i gonna have to show you
that if it feels right get on your mark
step to the beat boy thats what its for
see madonna liveget tickets as low as 50you might also likeprechorus
put your arms around me
when it gets too hot we can go outside
but for now just come here let me whisper in your ear
an invitation to the dance of life

lets get this started
